noCacheHeaders.description: noCacheHeaders is the header <-> match map pair to match in http for entity headers to remove

etagHeaders.description: etagHeaders is the string of entity headers to remove

cachecontrol.Config.description: Config is the config values for the cache-control middleware

enabled.description: Enabled authentication on the server, not recommended to disable

token.description: Token contains the token config settings for the issued tokens

supportedProviders.description: SupportedProviders are the supported oauth providers that have been configured

providers.description: Providers contains supported oauth2 providers configuration

config.Auth.description: Auth settings including oauth2 providers and token configuration

maxWorkers.description: MaxWorkers is the maximum number of workers in the pool

config.PondPool.description: PondPool contains the settings for the goroutine pool

debug.description: Debug enables debug mode for the server

dev.description: Dev enables echo's dev mode options

listen.description: Listen sets the listen address to serve the echo server on

metricsPort.description: MetricsPort sets the port for the metrics endpoint

shutdownGracePeriod.description: ShutdownGracePeriod sets the grace period for in flight requests before shutting down

readTimeout.description: ReadTimeout sets the maximum duration for reading the entire request including the body

writeTimeout.description: WriteTimeout sets the maximum duration before timing out writes of the response

idleTimeout.description: IdleTimeout sets the maximum amount of time to wait for the next request when keep-alives are enabled

readHeaderTimeout.description: ReadHeaderTimeout sets the amount of time allowed to read request headers

tls.description: TLS contains the tls configuration settings

cors.description: CORS contains settings to allow cross origin settings and insecure cookies

secure.description: Secure contains settings for the secure middleware

redirects.description: Redirect contains settings for the redirect middleware

cacheControl.description: CacheControl contains settings for the cache control middleware

mime.description: Mime contains settings for the mime middleware

graphPool.description: GraphPool contains settings for the goroutine pool used by the graph resolvers

enableGraphExtensions.description: EnableGraphExtensions enables the graph extensions for the graph resolvers

complexityLimit.description: ComplexityLimit sets the maximum complexity allowed for a query

maxResultLimit.description: MaxResultLimit sets the maximum number of results allowed for a query

csrfProtection.description: CSRFProtection enables CSRF protection for the server

config.Server.description: Server settings for the echo server

enabled.description: Enabled turns on TLS settings for the server

certFile.description: CertFile location for the TLS server

certKey.description: CertKey file location for the TLS server

autoCert.description: AutoCert generates the cert with letsencrypt, this does not work on localhost

config.TLS.description: TLS settings for the server for secure connections

enabled.description: Enable or disable the CORS middleware

prefixes.description: Prefixes is a map of prefixes to allowed origins

allowOrigins.description: AllowOrigins is a list of allowed origins

cookieInsecure.description: CookieInsecure sets the cookie to be insecure

cors.Config.description: Config holds the cors configuration settings

enabled.description: Enabled indicates whether CSRF protection is enabled.

header.description: Header specifies the header name to look for the CSRF token.

cookie.description: Cookie specifies the cookie name used to store the CSRF token.

secure.description: Secure sets the Secure flag on the CSRF cookie.

sameSite.description:
SameSite configures the SameSite attribute on the CSRF cookie. Valid
values are "Lax", "Strict", "None" and "Default".

csrf.Config.description: Config defines configuration for the CSRF middleware wrapper.

betaHeader.description: BetaHeader specifies the beta API features to enable

legacyTextCompletion.description: LegacyTextCompletion enables legacy text completion API

model.description: Model specifies the model name to use

apiKey.description: APIKey contains the authentication key for the service

model.description: Model specifies the model name to use

apiKey.description: APIKey contains the authentication key for the service

accountID.description: AccountID specifies the Cloudflare account ID

entityTypes.description: EntityTypes is the list of entity types to create by default for the organization

summarizer.description: Summarizer contains configuration for text summarization

entconfig.Config.description: Config holds the configuration for the ent server

model.description: Model specifies the model name to use

apiKey.description: APIKey contains the authentication key for the service

credentialsPath.description: CredentialsPath is the path to Google Cloud credentials file

credentialsJSON.description: CredentialsJSON contains Google Cloud credentials as JSON string

maxTokens.description: MaxTokens specifies the maximum tokens for response

entconfig.GeminiConfig.description: GeminiConfig contains Google Gemini specific configuration

model.description: Model specifies the model name to use

apiKey.description: APIKey contains the authentication key for the service

model.description: Model specifies the model name to use

apiKey.description: APIKey contains the authentication key for the service

model.description: Model specifies the model to use
Model specifies the model name to use

apiKey.description: APIKey contains the authentication key for the service

organizationID.description: OrganizationID specifies the OpenAI organization ID

type.description: Type specifies the summarization algorithm to use

llm.description: LLM contains configuration for large language model based summarization

maximumSentences.description: MaximumSentences specifies the maximum number of sentences in the summary

entconfig.Summarizer.description: Summarizer holds configuration for the text summarization functionality

provider.description: Provider specifies which LLM service to use

anthropic.description: Anthropic contains configuration for Anthropic's API

mistral.description: Mistral contains configuration for Mistral's API

gemini.description: Gemini contains configuration for Google's Gemini API

huggingFace.description: HuggingFace contains configuration for HuggingFace's API

ollama.description: Ollama contains configuration for Ollama's API

cloudflare.description: Cloudflare contains configuration for Cloudflare's API

openai.description: OpenAI contains configuration for OpenAI's API

entconfig.SummarizerLLM.description: SummarizerLLM contains configuration for multiple LLM providers

debug.description: debug enables printing the debug database logs

databaseName.description: the name of the database to use with otel tracing

multiWrite.description: enables writing to two databases simultaneously

secondaryDbSource.description: dsn of the secondary database if multi-write is enabled

migrationProvider.description: migration provider to use for running migrations

enableHistory.description: enable history data to be logged to the database

hostUrl.description: host url with scheme of the openFGA API

modelFile.description: path to the fga model file

apiToken.description: api token for the openFGA client

clientId.description: client id for the openFGA client

clientSecret.description: client secret for the openFGA client

redirectUrl.description: RedirectURL is the URL that the OAuth2 client will redirect to after authentication is complete

github.description: Github contains the configuration settings for the Github Oauth Provider

google.description: Google contains the configuration settings for the Google Oauth Provider

webauthn.description: Webauthn contains the configuration settings for the Webauthn Oauth Provider

handlers.OauthProviderConfig.description: OauthProviderConfig represents the configuration for OAuth providers such as Github and Google

enabled.description: Enabled indicates if the mime middleware should be enabled

mimeTypesFile.description: MimeTypesFile is the file to load mime types from

defaultContentType.description: DefaultContentType is the default content type to set if no mime type is found

mime.Config.description: Config defines the config for Mime middleware

enabled.description: Enabled indicates if the store is enabled

provider.description: Provider is the name of the provider, eg. disk, s3, will default to disk if nothing is set

accessKey.description: AccessKey is the access key for the storage provider

region.description: Region is the region for the storage provider

secretKey.description: SecretKey is the secret key for the storage provider

credentialsJSON.description: CredentialsJSON is the credentials JSON for the storage provider

defaultBucket.description:
DefaultBucket is the default bucket name for the storage provider, if not set, it will use the default
this is the local path for disk storage or the bucket name for S3

localURL.description:
LocalURL is the URL to use for the "presigned" URL for the file when using local storage
e.g for local development, this can be http://localhost:17608/files/

keys.description:
Keys is a list of keys to look for in the multipart form on the REST request
if the keys are not found, the request upload will be skipped
this is not used when uploading files with gqlgen and the graphql handler

maxSizeMB.description: MaxUploadSizeMB is the maximum size of file uploads to accept in megabytes

maxMemoryMB.description: MaxUploadMemoryMB is the maximum memory in megabytes to use when parsing a multipart form

objects.Config.description: Config is the configuration for the object store

ratelimit.Config.description: Config defines the configuration settings for the default rate limiter

enabled.description: Enabled indicates if the redirect middleware should be enabled

redirects.description: Redirects is a map of paths to redirect to

code.description: Code is the HTTP status code to use for the redirect

redirect.Config.description: Config contains the types used in executing redirects via the redirect middleware

enabled.description: Enabled indicates if the secure middleware should be enabled

xssprotection.description: XSSProtection is the value to set the X-XSS-Protection header to - default is 1; mode=block

contenttypenosniff.description: ContentTypeNosniff is the value to set the X-Content-Type-Options header to - default is nosniff

xframeoptions.description: XFrameOptions is the value to set the X-Frame-Options header to - default is SAMEORIGIN

hstspreloadenabled.description: HSTSPreloadEnabled is a boolean to enable HSTS preloading - default is false

hstsmaxage.description: HSTSMaxAge is the max age to set the HSTS header to - default is 31536000

contentsecuritypolicy.description: ContentSecurityPolicy is the value to set the Content-Security-Policy header to - default is default-src 'self'

referrerpolicy.description: ReferrerPolicy is the value to set the Referrer-Policy header to - default is same-origin

cspreportonly.description: CSPReportOnly is a boolean to enable the Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only header - default is false

secure.Config.description: Config contains the types used in the mw middleware

refreshInterval.description: RefreshInterval determines how often to reload the config

server.description: Server contains the echo server settings

entConfig.description: EntConfig contains the ent configuration used by the ent middleware

auth.description: Auth contains the authentication token settings and provider(s)

authz.description: Authz contains the authorization settings for fine grained access control

db.description: DB contains the database configuration for the ent client

jobQueue.description: JobQueue contains the configuration for the job queue (river) client

redis.description: Redis contains the redis configuration for the key-value store

tracer.description: Tracer contains the tracing config for opentelemetry

email.description: Email contains email sending configuration for the server

sessions.description: Sessions config for user sessions and cookies

totp.description: TOTP contains the configuration for the TOTP provider

ratelimit.description: Ratelimit contains the configuration for the rate limiter

objectStorage.description: ObjectStorage contains the configuration for the object storage backend

subscription.description: Entitlements contains the configuration for the entitlements service

description: Config contains the configuration for the core server
